front.note: Project IEEE 802.16 Broadband Wireless Access Working Group <http://ieee802.org/16>

docTitle.titlePart: Title Methods For DCR Mode Operation and Coverage Loss in IEEE 802.16m (16.2.18)

byline.docAuthor:
Shantidev Mohanty, Xiangying Yang, Muthaiah
Venkatachalam,

front.note:
Re:
Call for LB #30b on " P802.16m/D3":
Target topic: " 16.2.18"
front.div:
Abstract This contribution proposes methods using which AMS in sleep mode can ensure that it
has up-to-date system information in IEEE 802.16m.

Purpose To be discussed and adopted by TGm for 802.16m Letter Ballot 30b.
Notice
This document does not represent the agreed views of the IEEE 802.16 Working Group or any of its
subgroups. It represents only the views of the participants listed in the "Source(s)" field above. It is
offered as a basis for discussion. It is not binding on the contributor(s), who reserve(s) the right to add,
amend or withdraw material contained herein.
Release
